song.title: Kaleidoscope
song.info:
Made with BUZZ tracker
Lyrics: Winter is turning into spring Who knows what the summer will bring? Sunny beaches, oceans blue I'm with me and you're with you But we need to go on Like the earth in circles Yeah we need to go on like the sun
Sky is crying while we weep Are you waking when I sleep?
But we need to go on Like the earth in circles Yeah we need to go on like the sun Like the sun Like the sun Like the sun Like the sun
